what: Manage Numbers from Repeated Mesurements in Labs
title: Manage Numbers from Repeated Mesurements in Labs
text: goal labmate help data management analysis lab setting, automating speeding processes. Many assays measurements used labs require data processing steps every time experiments repeated. experiments complex designs generate quite cumbersome spreadsheets, processing adding existing data (based grouping information) time consuming. used lot functions working lab, saved lot time, especially day lab meeting…

title: Manage Numbers from Repeated Mesurements in Labs
text: can install development version labmate GitHub :

title: Manage Numbers from Repeated Mesurements in Labs
text: basic example shows use group_mean summarise means measurements group samples.
code: library(labmate) ## basic example code group_mean(PlantGrowth, group, weight)  #> # A tibble: 3 × 3 #>   group     n  mean #>   <fct> <int> <dbl> #> 1 ctrl     10  5.03 #> 2 trt1     10  4.66 #> 3 trt2     10  5.53

what: Summarise mean value for each group — group_mean
title: Summarise mean value for each group — group_mean
text: Like summarise(), group_mean()creates new data frame. combination grouping one variable caculating measurements group. also useful calculating average technical repeats, immunohistochemitry quantification (multiple measurements one sample).

title: Summarise mean value for each group — group_mean
Summarise mean value for each group — group_mean
text: data input dataset, including least column grouping information column measurements var1 variable group , can condition/genotype/treament.. var2 variable calculate means

title: Summarise mean value for each group — group_mean
text: tibble group names, sample size group, means group.

title: Summarise mean value for each group — group_mean
code: group_mean(data = PlantGrowth, var1 = group, var2 = weight) #> # A tibble: 3 × 3 #>   group     n  mean #>   <fct> <int> <dbl> #> 1 ctrl     10  5.03 #> 2 trt1     10  4.66 #> 3 trt2     10  5.53
